  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4629</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Converting Fractions into Percentages</string>
            <string language="es">Conversión de fracciones a porcentajes</string>
            <string language="ga">Codáin a Athrú go Céatadáin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umwandelnde Brüche in Prozentsätze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions convertissantes dans des pourcentages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frações convertendo-se em porcentagens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazioni convertentesi nelle percentuali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετατροπή των μερών στα ποσοστά</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worked examples and questions for pupils to practise converting fractions into percentages.</string>
            <string language="es">Ejemplos con demostraciones y preguntas para que los alumnos practiquen convirtiendo fracciones en porcentajes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Samplaí oibrithe agus ceisteanna do dhaltaí le cleachtadh a dhéanamh ar chodáin a athrú go céatadáin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bearbeitete Beispiele und Fragen, damit Pupillen 
üben, Brüche in Prozentsätze umzuwandeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exemples et questions travaillés pour que les 
pupilles pratiquent convertir des fractions en pourcentages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exemplos e perguntas trabalhados para que as 
pupilas pratiquem converter frações em porcentagens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esempi e domande funzionati affinchè pupille si 
esercitino in convertire le frazioni in percentuali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασμένες παραδείγματα και ερωτήσεις για τους μαθητές
στην πρακτική που μετατρέπει τα μέρη στα ποσοστά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
